#this is the manual.

= Installation =
tar vzxf warcarrier.tar.gz<br />
./warcarrier

= Key Commands =

  * "h" for help.
  * "s" for snapshot.
  * "g" to reset graph.
  * "q" OR "CTRL+C" to quit.
  * "i" extra satellite info.
  * "c" Catchme-NG! functionality
  * "b" ~~add Bluetooth device at any time~~
